weekly_top_story.headline: CMS Announces ACCESS Model to Innovate Chronic Care Management for Medicare Beneficiaries
weekly_top_story.summary: The Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services introduced the ACCESS (Advancing Chronic Care with Effective, Scalable Solutions) Model to test new payment approaches for technology-supported chronic disease management in Original Medicare, aiming to improve health outcomes and prevention.

stories.headline: Medicare Open Enrollment Period Ends December 7, Urging Beneficiaries to Review Coverage
stories.summary: Medicare's open enrollment for 2025 closes on December 7, underscoring the importance for beneficiaries to secure appropriate coverage and maintain healthcare security for the coming year.
